name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series
description: From Earth to the Milano to Knowhere and beyond, and set to the beat of awesome music, this five-part episodic series puts you in the rocket-powered boots of Star-Lord in an original Guardians adventure.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64Bit Service Pack 1 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTS 450+ with 1024MB+ VRAM (excluding GT) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X 11 sound device Additional Notes: Not Recommended for Intel integrated graphics. For more detailed specs to optimize the performance of Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series, please visit: <a href="http://steamcommunity.com/games/579950/announcements/detail/236845654398215964" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer"  >http://steamcommunity.com/games/579950/announcements/detail/236845654398215964
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
